caption: DAO - Create Mint Proposal To DAO Treasury
doc: Create a proposal to mint a new batch of tokens to the DAO treasury.

AMc.caption: DAO Address
AMc.doc: The contract address of the DAO being proposed to.
AMc.name: dao_address

AMe.caption: Token Address
AMe.doc: The ERC-20 governance token contract address that is being proposed to mint.
AMe.name: token_address

AMg.caption: Amount Of Tokens
AMg.doc: The amount of the governance token we are wanting to mint.
AMg.name: amount
